LanguageData.HDH_LightRequirementTooltip: Enabling this will require light for plant growth in HDH hydroponics. Light thresholds depend on plant type.
LanguageData.HDH_KillOnPowerLossTooltip: Enabling this will kill all plants in the hydroponics if power is lost.
LanguageData.HDH_AllowOtherVanillaPlantsTooltip: Allow some other vanilla plants like corn, hay, and devilstrand to be able to grow in these hydroponics.
